thread.title_full: TVS Wego with BS-IV engine launched in India at Rs 50,434 : New Launches, News - India Today

title: TVS Wego with BS-IV engine launched in India at Rs 50,434 : New Launches, News - India Today
text:
TVS Wego with BS-IV engine launched in India at Rs 50,434 IndiaToday.in | New Delhi, February 21, 2017 | Written by Pratik Rakshit | UPDATED 17:08 IST 
TVS Motor Company has launched two new colours (Metallic Orange and T-Grey) for its popular scooter, TVS Wego for a price of Rs 50,434 (Ex-Showroom, New Delhi). The refreshed Wego models now get a BS-IV compliant 110 cc CVTI engine and additional features. 
Design: 
TVS Wego will now come with a dual tone seat cover, silver oak panels and a USB charging port. 
Engine: 
The TVS Wego now comes with a 109.7cc, 4-stroke, CVTi, Single Cylinder, air cooled engine that churns out peak power of 8 bhp and peak torque of 8NM and is also BS-IV emissions complaint. 
Features: 
TVS Wego comes with telescopic front shock absorbers, full digital speedometer. It provides high levels of comfort and best-in-class mileage, making it complete feature laden package with state-of-the-art technology including the latest Synchronized Braking System (SBS). 
Competition: 
The TVS Wego competes against the likes of Honda Activa 3G, Yamaha Alpha, Yamaha RAY Z and Suzuki Access 125 in India.
